name: Spooky Mayhem
description:
The player begins this nightmare by running towards a haunted house to collect then the only lamp within the intro level. Once he collects this level he immediately begins running out of the house and the main boss begins his hunt for dinner (the player). The first level is home to the reaper, and he utilizes the undead (zombie hands) to try and capture you. These zombie hands are death boxes and each time the player falls into these traps a horrible scream is heard from the player. The player makes his way to his next destination by reaching the next boss, which is the Skull Ice King. In this next environment the player repeats the process, but his next method of surviving is jumping over the bosses’ ice barrier and floating platforms. The nightmare is only beginning as the player progresses to the next level which is the domain of the Scary Pumpkin. In this level the player jumps over witches’ pots that are filled boiling material. The nightmare continues to the next level which is dominated by the Scarecrow. During this level the player must jump over spikes and runs into a cornfield. Finally, the player finally reaches the last level which is a circus filled with acid puddles and guides the player to face all the previous bosses. The player must jump over them by utilizing the platforms over the head of these bosses. Once the player completes this, he is finally free from the nightmare and he goes on to live out another day.

This game is available only for PC. 

Assets Used:

None of the Assets were made by me. All assets are property of:

-Paint 3D

-UnityAssetStore
